title: "Man charged in fatal stolen-car shooting acted in self-defense, attorney says"
excerpt: "A man accused of confronting purported car thieves, shooting and killing one, acted in self-defense, his attorney argued in court Wednesday. The Metropolitan Police Department arrested Christopher Hall, 51, on a murder count in the death of Rodrigo Maya Blanco."
